SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
PARTNER RELATIONSHIP MANAGEMENT
Partner Relationship Management Reports and Dashboards

See a list of the reports, dashboards, and custom report types that are included with Partner Relationship Management (PRM). Every release, an automated process delivers the latest PRM report and dashboard improvements to your org. Report and dashboard folder names correspond to the Salesforce release when they were delivered.

Available for channel managers in Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, Developer Editions with Sales Cloud or Service Cloud. You must have at least one PRM add-on license.
PRM Reports
REPORT FOLDER	REPORT	DESCRIPTION
Partner Engagement	Last Logins by Partner Across All Sites	What are the most recent logins across all of my partner sites last month?
Partner Logins by Site	What's the login history for each of my partner sites last week?
Channel Marketing	Approved Partner Fund Claims	Which market development fund claims were approved by channel managers?
Approved Partner Fund Requests	Which market development fund requests were approved by channel managers?
Open Partner Fund Claims	What are the open market development fund claims submitted by partners?
Open Partner Fund Requests	What are the open market development fund requests submitted by partners?
Total Partner Marketing Budget	What is the amount and creation date for each of my partner marketing budgets, and what's the total of all budgets? Budgets are grouped by partner account.
Channel Productivity	Average Lead Score by Lead Status	What is the average lead score for the last quarter?
Average Opportunity Score by Stage	What is the average opportunity score for the last quarter?
Scored Lead Records	How many leads have been scored using Einstein Lead Scoring?
Scored Opportunity Records	How many opportunities have been scored using Einstein Opportunity Scoring?
Channel Sales	Lead Conversion Rate	What percentage of leads have been converted?
Open Opportunities by Partner	What opportunities are open from the last quarter?
Open Opportunities by Stage	What are the open opportunities, grouped by stage?
Revenue Closed by Quarter	How much revenue was closed last quarter?
Top Opportunities	What are the top opportunities, sorted by amount?
PRM Dashboards
DASHBOARD	DESCRIPTION	WIDGETS
Channel Management	Track key metrics and get insights about partner sales, productivity, and enablement. This dashboard is included on the standard Channel Management Console app home page.	Lead Conversion Rate
Number of Enablement Accounts
Number of Enablement Users1
Overall Program Completion Rate
Open Opportunities by Partner
Open Opportunities by Stage
Revenue Closed by Quarter
Channel Marketing	Track key metrics on marketing budget status and progress.	Approved Partner Fund Claims
Approved Partner Fund Requests
Open Partner Fund Claims
Open Partner Fund Requests
Total Partner Marketing Budget
Channel Productivity	Track key metrics on partner leads and opportunities.	Average Lead Score by Lead Status
Average Opportunity Score by Stage
Open Pipeline by Stage
Scored Lead Records
Scored Opportunity Records
Channel Sales	Track key metrics on partner sales performance.	Lead Conversion Rate
Open Opportunities by Partner
Open Opportunities by Stage
Revenue Closed by Quarter
Top Opportunities
Custom Report Types

PRM includes these predesigned custom report types, which let you create your own reports on partner data. See Build a Report in Lightning Experience.

REPORT TYPE	DESCRIPTION
Login History for Experience Cloud Site Users	Report on the login history of your Experience Cloud site users.
Partner Fund Requests	Report on market development fund requests from partners.
Partner Fund Requests and Partner Fund Claims	Report on market development fund requests and fund claims from partners.
Partner Marketing Budgets	Report on your partner marketing budgets, including budget amounts per partner account, and the date when the budget is no longer available.
1 Requires an Enablement license.
